channel.title: Need help with compile.bat problem inside pls read
channel.description:
:confused: ok if i need any programs or sumat to rune compile . bat itl probly be known to u guys please tell me wats wrong ;D :D :rolleyes: ;) :) :P :cool: :eek: :o :( :mad: :| :confused:
this is the error below
'"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. '"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe"' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need help with compile.bat problem inside pls read
item.dc:creator: @xCrackingx xCrackingx
item.description:
@xCrackingx wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:20948”][quote author=xCrackingx link=topic=31846.msg374613#msg374613 date=1162216748]
I really don’t know, but i suggest downloading the newest java from http://Java.com/ (Should be 9.0) and then right click “Compile.BAT” select edit and delete everything. Replace it with this

@echo off COLOR 09 title Yourservernamehere Compiler "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe" server pause
[/quote]
Thanks for copying exactly what Is said i your thread buddy lol.[/quote]

I got that from a help thread some pages above this one (around 6-10)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 03:10:26 AM[/size][hr]Hmm…Well no idea then there, sorry. You should have an ‘Edit’ option by it.

Read full topic
